website_summaries.verdict: Money-saving multiple pack of a classic canned computer cleaner that uses compressed air to keep keyboards and mice dirt and debris-free.
pros: Comes with a long, thin extension tube for hard to reach places, such as keyboards
Completely harmless to the ozone layer
Also works well with the insides of other electronics, such as printers, video game consoles, desktops, and TVs
cons: Should not be tilted when used, or liquid can spray out
Can get too cold to handle if using for an extended period

customer_reviews.title: comes apart
customer_reviews.text: I've used these a bunch of times and each time I buy them the same thing happens... The entire cap comes off when you press it down to spray. It's ridiculously cheap. Also the pressure is not a powerful as other brands, and every once is a while the straw is shot out like a projectile.
customer_reviews.author: Corrado

customer_reviews.title: Shopped and shopped
customer_reviews.text: Nice handling size can. Blows air rather long before cool lock as thes ethings do. IF YOU HAD or have a huge blow to do THREE IS BETTER than ONE and you could continue cleaning with can #2 after can #1 achieves the inevitable over cool effect these gasses do. Satisfying to blow those stubborn lint balls off a CPU cooler every so often.
customer_reviews.author: pp

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good to blow the dust off my server. Also, when turning it upside down, the air comes out as a liquid, and freezes! Is cool! Cools down electronics. Liquid is not electric conductive, so it's safe to use on electronics. Though it's best to keep the can upright, or the air will go out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Broken, Defective
customer_reviews.text: I left the package unopened until now. When I need it, it turns out the first bottle was empty with the black head cap broken and the second one is defective. Every time I try to pull the trigger, the cap comes off unable to discharge air. Not very nice!
customer_reviews.author: sbaker608

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!  Take the risk I took and receive three duds.
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for weeks, arrival brought three DEFECTIVE cans-one empty, two with broken tops. Go to Office Depot for this! Non-returnable. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne V.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal . Air is great for cleaning computer and more
customer_reviews.text: Air is great for cleaning computer and more. I like them. I continue to reorder about every year, maybe less. Use then to clean filter on iRoomba. Great for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Altech

customer_reviews.title: Good but gets too cold to fast
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this cleared the dust in my ionizer air purifier as filter cannot be removed. But it gets cold so fast ( 1-2 minutes ) that it took me multiple tries and days to finish. It runs out fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lyneice Simmons

customer_reviews.title: many many uses
customer_reviews.text: The cans I received were designed a little different, but it was the same product as advertised, 3-10 oz. cans of compressed air, with tube. Can be used for so many different jobs, we use it on all electronics, the inside of our t.v. that duat seems to get in through the vents, dust in our doll cabinet and on dolls without touching them,tops of cupboards and tops of any type of a cabinet, dust anywhere that's difficult to reach, underneath heavy furniture on hard floors. More uses than you can imagine, we use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Jacket

customer_reviews.title: Dustoff is a solid product
customer_reviews.text: I'm scratching my head on the third ranking question. It's just says "Stretch" that's Fn weird. It's dustoff it does what's it's meant to but the person writing these questions probably Huff's it. L8r
customer_reviews.author: Skinner Giles

customer_reviews.title: It works fine for cleaning computer and keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It is compressed air. No issues. It works. I feel like compressed air is getting more expensive but this was the cheapest I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Wmac

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting
customer_reviews.text: Still waiting to see if this is really going to work. Delivered when cold. Waiting to see what happen after it warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Clears dust and cats away
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They have a small tube extender so the compressed gas gets in between the keyboard keys. I only use this in the office so I'm not sure how well it works for other things. A bonus, for me anyway, is that the cats are scared of the sound so you can use it as a training tool to keep them off the office desk.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Suspect

customer_reviews.title: Falcon Compressed Gas (152a) Disposable Cleaning Duster
customer_reviews.text: Been using this Brand of canned Air for over 10 years now. The Best of them all. Tried a couple of other Brands and was not real happy with the performance of them. Falcon is always a good buy because of the quality. Works great for removing dust from most Electronics. Great for cleaning the crumbs from a Computer Keyboard. Also works for cleaning Fishing Reels, Hand Guns, small Motors and anywhere you want to be sure moisture is removed from small parts.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but its pretty pricy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my office. Pretty pricy for air cans but it does exactly what its supposed to do. Gets a 4/5 because its expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Hea597

customer_reviews.title: They really blow.
customer_reviews.text: Its a can of compressed air. It does the job and blows out air. Can I have my 2 dollar credit now, please?
customer_reviews.author: J. Hagee

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: bought in the 3pk. makes this a good value, and do as advertised
customer_reviews.author: John Linder

customer_reviews.title: Air in a can
customer_reviews.text: Nice cans they blow away the dirt and dust no problem
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: good compressed air
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy my compressed air at Costco but they come with too many for me now so this set of 3 was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: A perfect product for helping to extend the life of your electronic equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This is like many other compressed gas canisters for cleaning your keyboard or tools or other small dust collecting areas.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: As one of the other reviews here said, the picture of this item does not exactly match the item delivered. But the canned air I got works fine and does the job. I'm happy with it. I've used many different brands of canned air at work and at home, but this is the brand that I think works best. No problems with tubes that break or won't stay in the cap. No broken triggers. It just works without problems.
customer_reviews.author: follick

customer_reviews.title: Not much pressure
customer_reviews.text: It gets cold and loses power as soon as you use it 2 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Rookhawk

customer_reviews.title: 3 Cans for a good price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used one can on everything. PC, Console, TV anything with moving parts and has an moving fan. I would highly recommend these cans to do the clean up job.
customer_reviews.author: edgar g.

customer_reviews.title: Trigger has some issues giving consistent force of air.
customer_reviews.text: Trigger has some issues giving consistent force of air. Sometimes gives little pressure, other times it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B. Walker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviews, I received bad product. Of 3 air cans, 1 arrived empty, 1 nozzle is broken and unusable. 3rd works, but not worth the price of three. Cannot return. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great power to clean our key boards and other small items.
customer_reviews.author: alma martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy, Dependable Product
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for cleaning keyboards, dried flower arangements, wreaths, anything that needs the dust removed without suctioning such as a vacuum would do. I bought the 3 can selection believing I could find plenty of uses & still working on using up my first can. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Good Canned Air ... Flawed Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using Falcon air from Amazon for a few years and decide to order their three pack. The lid was off one of the cans and another lid had a piece broken off. Were not for that I'd give it 5 stars, will go back to ordering single cans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: One of the cans was empty on arrival. Other than that it's exactly what you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: One can doesn't work after a few minutes of use but it was enough to clean my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Junbong

customer_reviews.title: Broken cans
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to other reviews. 2 of the cans came broken and inoperable
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Haywood

customer_reviews.title: The Best compressed gas out there!
customer_reviews.text: We use many of these for our sign business and we have tried twice some other brands with lower prices but were not happy with it - hey stopped working after 2-3 uses only. Dust OFF is the best on the market and we highly recommend it - it's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: A. Grigorova

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Very little pressure and freezes up after a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Flower decorations in your home!
customer_reviews.text: I use these not only for my keyboards/printer but also i have silk flowered swags around my house for decorations and once a week i give them all a nice air blowing and it keeps the dust off of them and looking brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: 1 bottle was empty!
customer_reviews.text: 1 bottle was completely empty!! What a waste! 2 out of the 3 straws broke when I took them off the can! Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Offended

customer_reviews.title: Great buy especially when bundled.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Gets the job done for when I am cleaning electronics or need to get dusting into small crevices.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Compressed Air
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and has a good burst but the only problem I have with it is that it needs to be held in a certain angle for the spray to work properly or else it requires a lot of force to spray. Pack of 3 is well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper'08

customer_reviews.title: I only received one bottle
customer_reviews.text: I order 3 bottles and only received one, Im very disappointment. We order before and this is the first time that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I've used other brands of this product only to be disappointed. Many times the air ran out much sooner than I had expected. While there's nothing spectacular about this brand, it doesn't disappoint, and that in itself is spectacular to me.
customer_reviews.author: Avi Goodman.

customer_reviews.title: Timely shipped; no problems
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped within reasonable time, no product damaged or defective
customer_reviews.author: John A Del Duco III

customer_reviews.title: Blows dust away
customer_reviews.text: 3 pack of compressed gas at this price was a good deal. Used it to clean up my PC and get all the dust and debris out of the case. Good buy at the price.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: its air in a can
customer_reviews.text: great product to knock the dust out of computer fans off of keyboards and the like. Its just air under pressure in a can that works wonderfull for everything you need to blow air on.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: Is fantastic for the money it works perfect everything came perfect
customer_reviews.text: Gray for the money they packaged it very well every bottle work perfect I am very satisfied and I'm already purchasing another bundle
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sieczka

customer_reviews.title: works better thsn i ecpected.
customer_reviews.text: Came on time and cleaned my camera just like I wanted it to. Plus blew dust out of my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: dust off
customer_reviews.text: i use this for multiple things and it is great....this was a good buy...I would reccomend this, it was way cheaper than at store.
customer_reviews.author: SarahStar

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner for Computer & machines
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ever canned air cleaner. I use it to clean keyboards and all sewing machines. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Oksewnsew

customer_reviews.title: Falcon Duster
customer_reviews.text: The duster works as advertised, was purchased at a fair price, was delivered promptly in good condition. It works better than plain air and has proved safe for sensitive components. Stream is powerful and leaves no detectable residue. Per instructions- do not use in unventilated / poorly ventilated spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: save the aggrevation - buy a small shop vac
customer_reviews.text: if you follow the instructions for use you will end up with a unit with a top that will not stay on the air cylinder of compressed gas. I tried holding the whole cap while removing the tear off tab. Inner plastic band supposed to hold cap on container split on 2 out of 3 so far
customer_reviews.author: William Wheeling Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Falcon Compressed Gas Duster
customer_reviews.text: This worked pretty well and the price was good. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: typhon0001

customer_reviews.title: It's a can of air
customer_reviews.text: It blows. It does what's it's supposed to do. It's relatively cheap. I hadn't cleaned out my computer in months, and I got these, and instantly my fans were quiet and things were running cooler. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Daveyjwin

customer_reviews.title: The product delivered is not the product in the image
customer_reviews.text: The product they delivered is not the product in the image. The product in the image is three cans with straight sides, rolled lips, and gas-release tubes, which are suitable for use with other tops. The product delivered has curved sides, non-detachable tops, and no gas-release tubes like this one [...], and is useless to me. I ordered these specifically because the image matched the product I am replacing; there is no warning on the product page that the image is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My computer loved it, will buy more
customer_reviews.text: While I’m a little confused as to why I have an option to rate the flavor of these 1-5 stars, I’m happy with my purchase. My laptop ran much better so maybe the flavor is great too? Only for consumption by computers.
customer_reviews.author: Duckie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I always use this brand as the force is strong and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Choosey One

product_meta.title: Falcon Compressed Gas (152a) Disposable Cleaning Duster 3 Count, 10 oz. Can (DPSXL3)
product_meta.description: Size:10 oz, 3 pkFalcon Dust-Off Aerosol Compressed (152a) Disposable Cleaning duster 3 count 10oz. Contains a bitterant to help discourage inhalant abuse
feature_bullets: Falcon Dust-Off Aerosol Compressed (152a) Disposable Cleaning duster 3 count 10oz. Contains a bitterant to help discourage inhalant abuse
Provides potent dust-removing power for practically any task.
Ideal for workstations, labs, repair benches, household use, on-location photography, etc.
100% Ozone safe Bitterant added to help discourage inhalant abuse

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars315 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
